data.title: Windows Server 2003 Tutorials, Visual and Step
data.text:
Welcome to my Windows Server 2003 tutorial website! Here you will find visual, step-by-step guides that can help you on your Windows Server journey. Everything has been tested personally, on a default installation. I cannot guarantee that the guides will always work, but they should on most configurations. Articles prefixed with "MS KB:" are links to Microsoft Knowledgebase articles ( http://support.microsoft.com ) that I have written.

Please keep yourself and your networks up to date on security patches

Visit http://www.microsoft.com/security/ for more information

Active Directory

Creating the first Windows Server 2003 Domain Controller in a domain

Adding a user to Windows Server 2003's Active Directory

Adding a computer to Windows Server 2003's Active Directory

Adding a Windows XP computer to Windows Server 2003's Active Directory

Adding a Windows 2000 computer to Windows Server 2003's Active Directory

Setting up Perl for use with IIS 6.0, step-by-step

Setting up PHP (ISAPI) for use with IIS 6.0

Setting Host Headers in IIS 6.0

Backing up your IIS 6.0 Metabase

Setting up SSL with a SelfSSL certificate on IIS 6.0

MS KB: How To: Serve WAP Websites (.WML) Using IIS 6.0

MS KB: SMTP Does Not Appear in the IIS Manager

Enabling ASP.NET support in IIS 6.0

Shell (GUI)

Setting up the usage of Luna and other themes on Windows Server 2003, step-by-step (unsupported)

More to come....when I think of what to add :-)

If you think you may have found an error in my writings, please contact me.

You can help support my quest for knowledge:

Visit my "What Works and What Doesn't in VPC 2004" page, available here.

The following are Windows Server 2003 FAQ sites:

Microsoft's Windows Server 2003 Technical Documentation

Larry Samuels' Unofficial Windows Server 2003 FAQ

Kristofer Gafvert's IT Notebook

And some Windows XP help sites:

Microsoft's Windows XP Help

Kelly's Korner
